item.title: CVE-2022-23983|2024-09-16T17:18:08.602Z -- wp-buy -- wp%20content%20copy%20protection%20%26%20no%20right%20click%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability leading to plugin Settings Update discovered in WP Content Copy Protection & No Right Click WordPress plugin (versions <= 3.4.4).
